content: Are you ready to become the part of World's 1st Engage to Earn NFT integrated Proof of Attention IDO Launchpad for the Web3 attention economy?If yes, then join us on July 14th at 3 PM CET for our upcoming Twitter Spaces session with our special guest Jacek Studzinski, CCO of Adshares discussing the immersive world of Metaverse.Join here: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1rmxPggNRYbJNhttps://twitter.com/AdLunamInc/status/1546642265229205504

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: If there is one thing that everyone is interested in these days, it has to be investing in crypto assets. With companies like AdLunam, coming up with new crypto projects has become easier than ever. With the help of unique businesses like AdLunam, numerous businesses are entering the crypto space. In addition, many countries have also started officially recognizing crypto-currency by imposing taxes on them. This means there is more scope for efficient Crypto markets due to the decreased possibility of them being illegal or banned.Join us tomorrow at 3 PM CET to discuss the immersive world of metaverse with our special guest Jacek Studzinski, COO of Adshares. Don't forget to ask your questions related to all things metaverse.Join here: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1rmxPggNRYbJNhttps://twitter.com/AdLunamInc/status/1546642265229205504
